synopsis.text: Rikkaâ€™s journey through high school has been anything but ordinary, as she grapples with the lingering effects of her "eighth-grader syndrome" even as a third-year student. As the pressure of university entrance exams mounts, Rikka and her long-time boyfriend, Yuuta, find solace in each other's company during spring break. But their world is turned upside down when Rikka's older sister, Touka, announces her plans to move the family to Italy for work. Fearing separation, Yuuta and Rikka's friends propose a daring solution: the couple should elope! And so begins a thrilling chase across Japan, as the two lovebirds embark on a desperate journey to stay together against all odds. Will their love conquer all, or will the realities of life catch up to them? Join Rikka and Yuuta in this heartwarming and exhilarating adventure that explores the depths of love and the power of dreams.
